Ripon (England).title: Ripon (England)
Ripon (England).byline: Ripon is a cathedral city in North Yorkshire, England, with a population in 2011 of 16,702.

Ripley (Derbyshire).title: Ripley (Derbyshire)
Ripley (Derbyshire).byline: Ripley is a market town of 20,000 people (2021) in Derbyshire, England.
